entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 4.
